name: Mango Mojito Recipe
description: Easy Refreshing Mango Mojito Recipe. Make this mojito with or without the alcohol. Refreshing mint and lime and sweet Summery Mango make this a perfect drink for any outdoor event. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe. Use other fruit puree for variation.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup mango puree from fresh mango or can (or use mango nectar or thick juice (I used Looza mango nectar).)
1/2 to 1 cup chilled water or club soda

recipeInstructions.text: Distribute the mint leaves in 2 to 3 cocktail glasses.
recipeInstructions.name: Distribute the mint leaves in 2 to 3 cocktail glasses.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a 1/4 tsp sugar, a pinch of salt and a thin slice of lime to each. Muddle the mixture to bruise the mint leaves. (use a wooden flat bottom muddler/stick or a pestle or back end of a spatula or use a spoon).
recipeInstructions.name: Add a 1/4 tsp sugar, a pinch of salt and a thin slice of lime to each. Muddle the mixture to bruise the mint leaves. (use a wooden flat bottom muddler/stick or a pestle or back end of a spatula or use a spoon).

recipeInstructions.text: Distribute the juice of a lime in the glasses. Fill the glasses with ice cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Distribute the juice of a lime in the glasses. Fill the glasses with ice cubes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mango puree, rum and water. Add more sugar if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mango puree, rum and water. Add more sugar if desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with mint leaves or lime slices and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with mint leaves or lime slices and serve.
